My Steam Favorites (Ranked by Playtime)

30 January 2025 - 3 mins read time
Tags: Gaming Steam

Source: Steam Library Playtime Stats (yes I am addicted), Zelda from Nintendo tho

This is my personal favs — ranked purely by hours invested.

1. The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild — > 190 Hours

My true open-world soulmate.

  • Total playtime: over 190 hours
  • Achievements: (Nintendo said no achievements but I achieved inner peace)

this is my therapy, not for my eyes tho

somehow spent 190 hours just vibing.

2. Elden Ring — 164 Hours

My longest relationship.

  • Total playtime: 164.2 hours
  • Achievements: 20/42

it is not a game it is an alternate life timeline where I willingly suffer for.

3. Death Stranding Director’s Cut — 136 Hours

This one hits different.

  • Total playtime: 135.9 hours
  • Achievements: 45/63

A game about loneliness, connection, walking, and Norman Reedus baby backpack.

4. Hollow Knight: Silksong — 96 Hours

I really love this but i modded it.

  • Total playtime: 96.3 hours
  • Achievements: 41/52

Apparently TC’s got something, she absolutely a top btw.

5. Resident Evil 4 Remake — 94 Hours

Leon and I have been through a lot together, love that man!

  • Total playtime: 94.4 hours
  • Achievements: 27/46

This game is pure adrenaline + inventory management. love the RE2 more tho

Apparently we got requiem for tomorrow, let me see who hasnt pre-order it yet? ( ͠° ͟ʖ ͡° )

6. Sultan’s Game — 60 Hours

Underrated gem.

  • Total playtime: 59.8 hours
  • Achievements: 4/13

The vibes are chaotic, the gameplay is addictive, and I honestly need more people to play this.

7. PUBG: Battlegrounds — 57 Hours

That era.

  • Total playtime: 57.1 hours
  • Achievements: 14/37

I was not good and I was not there. no meme cause i suck : (

8. Let’s School — 57 Hours

i am also a sims girl i guess

  • Total playtime: 57.2 hours
  • Achievements: 34/44

Sometimes I need peace after hustling

9. Resident Evil 2 Remake — 51 Hours

Stress simulator.

  • Total playtime: 51.0 hours
  • Achievements: 31/44

Mr. X taught me fear and Leon taught me simping

10. Hogwarts Legacy — 51 Hours

Pure standard mediocre rpg product, i got it cause on all-time low.

  • Total playtime: 51.0 hours
  • Achievements: 15/45

11. Black Myth: Wukong — 51 Hours

This game a art.

  • Total playtime: 50.7 hours
  • Achievements: 51/81

Say no more u gotta have it

12. Hades — 24 Hours

Shorter playtime, but extremely intense, lit my whole room up at night

bro i just wanna see my mama

  • Total playtime: 24.4 hours
  • Achievements: 13/49

I will come back, not because i love it but that i got 2 too

Final Thoughts

Apparently my Steam personality is:

  • Epic boss fights
  • Horror survival
  • Emotional walking simulators
  • The occasional cozy management game

Thanks for reading! when will Bloodborne be on PC Sony?
